titles.title: Homeowners Property Tax Relief Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the deduction for property taxes in determining the amount of the alternative minimum taxable income of any taxpayer (other than a corporation).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
1/9/2009--Introduced.
Homeowners Property Tax Relief Act of 2009- Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the deduction of state and local real and personal property taxes in calculating the alternative minimum taxable income of individual taxpayers.
